thread.title: Sherlock special 'The Abominable Bride' will air in UK cinemas in January - Sherlock Cult
thread.title_full: Sherlock special 'The Abominable Bride' will air in UK cinemas in January - Sherlock News - Cult - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: Sherlock special 'The Abominable Bride' will air in UK cinemas in January - Sherlock Cult
text: Sherlock: The Movie is finally happening. Well, not really, but it is heading to the big screen.In exciting news from the Sherlock panel at MCM London Comic Con - the upcoming special was given the title of The Abominable Bride.Get ready to meet The Abominable Bride – airing on 1st January 2016 #221Back #Sherlock #shspesh pic.twitter.com/y1ltJAbfFd— Sherlock (@Sherlock221B) October 24, 2015 The special will air on January 1, 2016 in the UK and the US on BBC One and BBC America, respectively.And it's also coming to UK cinemas, with tickets going on sale on November 2.Get ready - #Sherlock will be on the big screen too, in selected cinemas! Tickets for the UK go on sale from 2nd November #221back— Sherlock (@Sherlock221B) October 24, 2015Earlier this week it was confirmed that Sherlock: The Abominable Bride would air in cinemas throughout China next year.Watch a trailer for the upcoming Sherlock special below:
